entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Indin River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
